author: poojaranjan
content: EIP-778: Ethereum Node Records (ENR) is already implemented in few clients and is in the "Last call".  If you're curious about the proposal or have questions, join the Ethereum cat Herders on *Peep an EIP-778  with Felix*  (<@!194432762315407360> ) on Dec 01 at 9:30 am ET (14:30 UTC).
